paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data and functional information.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: To confirm that the constitutive conduction phenotype observed in V659C, Q664C, Y667C, and S668C was due to hERG current and not passive leak or conduction through other ion channels.
To confirm that the constitutive conduction phenotype observed in V659C, Q664C, Y667C, and S668C was due to hERG current and not passive leak or conduction through other ion channels.

functional_data.summary: Cysteine mutagenesis identified important gating residues within the hERG S6 domain.

variants.additional_notes: All four mutants were biased toward the open state.
key_quotes: To confirm that the constitutive conduction phenotype observed in V659C, Q664C, Y667C, and S668C was due to hERG current and not passive leak or conduction through other ion channels.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was consistent and clear regarding the KCNH2 variants.
